ComicInfo.Summary:
Things die hard in the swamp. Victor Crowley's fury is unquenchable despite the rivers of blood beneath his terrible touch. But vengeance never dies. When a drug dealer father driven mad with grief seeks a voodoo priestess to end the beast that slaughtered his son, a new horror is unleashed on Honey Island Swamp and an unsuspecting group of criminals is caught in a bloody monster free-for-all! This is classic violent slasher horror at its best and bloodiest! Hatchet: Vengeance #1 comes with four covers - Main Faceoff by interior artist Puis Calzada, Blood & Gore by Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser, Bikini Optional by Mike Wolfer, and a special limited-edition Hatchet: Vengeance Bloody Horror cover.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Main Faceoff Cover | Puis Calzada | 1 | Var | Blood & Gore Variant Cover | Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser | 2 | Var | Bikini Optional Nude Variant Cover | Mike Wolfer | 3 | LE | Limited Edition Blood Horror Variant Cover, Limited to 450 | Puis Calzada | 4 | LE | Limited Edition Extreme Gore Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Gabriel Mangum & Andrew Mangum | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-17 21:43:17. [CVDB690732]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Mangum, Buz Hasson, Gabriel Mangum, Ken Haeser, Mike Wolfer, Puis Calzada
